name: Robotic Exoskeleton
description: Your exoskeleton provides you with additional protection, increasing your armor. After taking too much damage, the exoskeleton breaks, interfereing with your internal form and damaging you as well as quickly draining your energy reserves. The exoskeleton can be repaired by using iron ingots. Using diamonds will improve your exoskeleton's protection. Using netherite ingots will fully repair your exoskeleton and improve its durability. On death, the exoskeleton will regain 25% durability.

actions.command: tellraw @s {"text":"Beginning critical repairs. Exoskeleton will reactivate in 5 seconds.","color":"green"}

action.command: tellraw @s {"text":"Your exoskeleton is still fully repaired.","color":"yellow"}
tellraw @s {"text":"Your exoskeleton can no longer upgrade its protection anymore.","color":"yellow"}
tellraw @s {"text":"Upgrade error: You recently took damage within the past 5 seconds.","color":"red"}
tellraw @s {"text":"Upgrade error: You have recently upgraded your exoskeleton within the past 5 minutes.","color":"red"}
tellraw @s {"text":"You must be sneaking to upgrade your exoskeleton.","color":"yellow"}

actions.command: tellraw @s {"text":"Upgrade successful: Exoskeleton damage protection effectiveness improved","color":"green"}

action.command: tellraw @s {"text":"Your exoskeleton can no longer upgrade its durability anymore.","color":"yellow"}
tellraw @s {"text":"Upgrade error: You recently took damage within the past 5 seconds.","color":"red"}
tellraw @s {"text":"Upgrade error: You have recently upgraded your exoskeleton within the past 5 minutes.","color":"red"}
tellraw @s {"text":"You must be sneaking to upgrade your exoskeleton.","color":"yellow"}
